item.title: 什么是 "明斯基时刻"，为什么会担心 "明斯基时刻"？
item.description: 只要一提到 "明斯基时刻"（Minsky moment），即依赖债务的市场和经济体的突然崩溃，决策者们就会不寒而栗。该理论源于美国经济学家海曼-明斯基（Hyman Minsky）的研究，他专门研究过度借贷如何助长金融不稳定。金融市场的繁荣或世界各地的高债务水平不时导致人们重新关注明斯基的理论或国际货币基金组织等机构发出的警告。美国财政部【原文：The mere mention of a “Minsky moment” — a sudden crash of markets and economies that are hooked on debt — is enough to send shudders through policy makers. The theory stems from the work of Hyman Minsky, a US economist who specialized in how excessive borrowing fuels financial instability. From time to time, booms in financial markets or sky-high debt levels around the world lead to renewed interest in Minsky’s theory or warnings from the International Monetary Fund, among others.
